Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot, Quickstride
Location: Deep Earth caverns

As Tuscon manuvered himself into the best position possible to unleash
his hopefully devasting attack, the insectile troopers continue to
close with the group! Perceptor once again shut down his audio
receptors as Straightshot and Quickstride braced for battle. Meanwhile
Talon and Legacy leaped from the vehicle and fired on the approaching
troopers in the desperate hope to buy Tuscon some time.

Talon opened fire . . .

[Insect Trooper #3 is HIT by Talon ] - Trooper #3 is at Light Damage

Meanwhile Legacy also opened fire, targeting another of the approaching horde!

[Insect Trooper #1 is HIT by Legacy] - Insect Trooper #1 is drops into
stasis lock!

Because of having to reposition himself, Tuscon is unable to fire
before the trooper reach him, and so he, as well as Legacy and Talon
have to fend off their attacks first . . .


[Insect Trooper #1] - Unable to attack - Stasis Lock
[Talon MISSED by Insect Trooper #2]
[Legacy MISSED by Insect Trooper #3]
[Tuscon MISSED by Insect Trooper #4]
[Tuscon MISSED by Insect Trooper #4]
[Talon is HIT by Insect Trooper #6] - Talon is at Light Damage

[Tuscon is HIT by Elite Insect Trooper #1] - Tuscon is at Light Damage

Finally Tuscon is able to return fire, and opens up with a wide area
audio assault, hoping to stun the approaching enemy!

[Insect Trooper #1] - Unaffected (Already In Stasis Lock)
[Insect Trooper #2] - Unaffected
[Insect Trooper #3] - Stunned 1 Round
[Insect Trooper #4] - Unaffected
[Insect Trooper #5] - Stunned 2 Rounds
[Insect Trooper #6] - Stunned 1 Round

[Elite Insect Trooper #1] - Unaffected

Some of the insectile troops stumble back at the rather surprising
attack from the truck that is Tuscon! All around the combatants the
walls rumbled slightly as a few loose stones and rocks fall to the
ground. However it stopped after a few moments.

Meanwhile as some of the insects reel in dismay, others come forward to attack!

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: As this stunning attack is something new to Tuscon I am having it
affect them at MUCH lower levels then it would ordinarily. I am trying
to figure out how I want to handle this using weapons in new ways. It
was not something that was done so much in the cartoon or the comics.
Basically folks had the weapons they had, and they used them to the
best of their abilities.

Anyways, food for thought.

-P
